content: seamless baby hooded pullover maggie van buiten i couldn t find a free pattern for a hooded baby s pullover that wasn t full of seaming so i decided to take a shot at designing my own this pattern uses multiple seamless construction techniques starting with a provisional cast on a top down raglan neckline and sleeves knitting in the round and kitchener stitch to finish the hood despite the diversity of techniques it s an easy pattern and a fast knit so i think it would be perfect for someone who would like to try their first seamless sweater all measurements are in centimeters size
